teaser: In which strangers let you use their bathrooms.
description: In which strangers let you use their bathrooms.

contentencoded:
You've heard of AirBnB, right? People using the Internet to rent out their apartments?

Perhaps this was inevitable, but we have now come to: "AirPnP."

Seriously. It's a real thing. Straight from their website: "When there aren't enough bathrooms nearby for the amount of people in any given location, AirPnP is there to save the day."

There's a mobile app coming soon, apparently.
title: The inevitable journey from AirBnB to AirPnP
